description: This detection method points out highly relevant Antivirus events
author: Florian Roth (Nextron Systems)
Arnim Rupp
false_positives: Some software piracy tools (key generators, cracks) are classified as hack tools
name: Relevant Anti-Virus Event
query: (winlog.channel:"Application" AND ((*Adfind*) OR (*ASP/BackDoor*) OR (*ATK/*) OR (*Backdoor.ASP*) OR (*Backdoor.Cobalt*) OR (*Backdoor.JSP*) OR (*Backdoor.PHP*) OR (*Blackworm*) OR (*Brutel*) OR (*BruteR*) OR (*Chopper*) OR (*Cobalt*) OR (*COBEACON*) OR (*Cometer*) OR (*CRYPTES*) OR (*Cryptor*) OR (*Destructor*) OR (*DumpCreds*) OR (*Exploit.Script.CVE*) OR (*Filecoder*) OR (*FastReverseProxy*) OR (*GrandCrab*) OR (*HackTool*) OR (*HKTL.*) OR (*HKTL/*) OR (*HKTL:*) OR (*HTool*) OR (*Impacket*) OR (*IISExchgSpawnCMD*) OR (*JSP/BackDoor*) OR (*Keylogger*) OR (*Koadic*) OR (*Krypt*) OR (*Lazagne*) OR (*Locker*) OR (*Metasploit*) OR (*Meterpreter*) OR (*MeteTool*) OR (*Mimikatz*) OR (*Mpreter*) OR (*Nighthawk*) OR (*Packed.Generic.347*) OR (*PentestPowerShell*) OR (*Phobos*) OR (*PHP/BackDoor*) OR (*Potato*) OR (*PowerSploit*) OR (*PowerSSH*) OR (*PshlSpy*) OR (*PSWTool*) OR (*PWCrack*) OR (*PWDump*) OR (*Ransom*) OR (*Rozena*) OR (*Ryzerlo*) OR (*Sbelt*) OR (*Seatbelt*) OR (*SecurityTool*) OR (*SharpDump*) OR (*Sliver*) OR (*Splinter*) OR (*Swrort*) OR (*Tescrypt*) OR (*TeslaCrypt*) OR (*Valyria*) OR (*Webshell*)) AND (NOT ((((*Keygen*) OR (*Crack*) OR (*anti_ransomware_service.exe*) OR (*cyber-protect-service.exe*))) OR (Level:"4"))))
